title: Print API crash Electron with dev-tool opening.
body:
Appear in v0.27.3 on Windows. Reproduce steps:
1. Launch Electron, and open dev-tool
2. Type `window.print()`
3. A system dialog shows up and click `cancel`
4. Close the Electron Window, then Electron Crashes.

If we close the dev-tool before closing browser window, it quit finely.

Below is stacktrace:

```
    electron.exe!std::_Tree_unchecked_const_iterator<std::_Tree_val<std::_Tree_simple_types<std::pair<net::URLFetcher const * __ptr64 const,base::Callback<void __cdecl(base::Value const * __ptr64)> > > >,std::_Iterator_base0>::operator++() Line 62 C++
    electron.exe!std::_Tree_const_iterator<std::_Tree_val<std::_Tree_simple_types<std::pair<net::URLFetcher const * __ptr64 const,base::Callback<void __cdecl(base::Value const * __ptr64)> > > > >::operator++() Line 272  C++
    electron.exe!std::_Tree_iterator<std::_Tree_val<std::_Tree_simple_types<std::pair<net::URLFetcher const * __ptr64 const,base::Callback<void __cdecl(base::Value const * __ptr64)> > > > >::operator++() Line 413    C++
>   electron.exe!brightray::InspectableWebContentsImpl::WebContentsDestroyed() Line 510 C++
    content.dll!content::WebContentsImpl::~WebContentsImpl() Line 414   C++
    [External Code] 
    electron.exe!base::DefaultDeleter<content::WebContents>::operator()(content::WebContents * ptr) Line 128    C++
    electron.exe!base::internal::scoped_ptr_impl<content::WebContents,base::DefaultDeleter<content::WebContents> >::~scoped_ptr_impl<content::WebContents,base::DefaultDeleter<content::WebContents> >() Line 224   C++
    [External Code] 
    electron.exe!brightray::InspectableWebContentsImpl::~InspectableWebContentsImpl() Line 176  C++
    [External Code] 
    electron.exe!base::DefaultDeleter<brightray::InspectableWebContents>::operator()(brightray::InspectableWebContents * ptr) Line 128  C++
    electron.exe!base::internal::scoped_ptr_impl<brightray::InspectableWebContents,base::DefaultDeleter<brightray::InspectableWebContents> >::reset(brightray::InspectableWebContents * p) Line 249 C++
    electron.exe!scoped_ptr<brightray::InspectableWebContents,base::DefaultDeleter<brightray::InspectableWebContents> >::reset(brightray::InspectableWebContents * p) Line 377  C++
    electron.exe!atom::CommonWebContentsDelegate::DestroyWebContents() Line 119 C++
    electron.exe!atom::NativeWindow::CloseContents(content::WebContents * source) Line 604  C++
    content.dll!content::WebContentsImpl::Close(content::RenderViewHost * rvh) Line 3821    C++
    content.dll!content::RenderViewHostImpl::OnMessageReceived(const IPC::Message & msg) Line 867   C++
    content.dll!content::RenderProcessHostImpl::OnMessageReceived(const IPC::Message & msg) Line 1539   C++
```
